#summary 编译TSearch2扩展
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured,Phase-Implementation

= 编译 =

{{{
$ cd exts/postgresql/chinese_parser
$ make
$ make install
}}}

= 安装 =
{{{
$ psql
jianingy=# \i /path/to/your/contrib/chinese_parser.sql
}}}

= 测试 =
{{{
$ psql
jianingy=# SELECT to_tsvector('chinesecfg', '我爱北京');
      to_tsvector       
------------------------
 '我':1 '爱':2 '北京':3
(1 row)
}}}
